meanings.definition: To move with force or speed, as in wind blowing through the trees.
To create a burst of air or wind, as in blowing out candles.
To cause to explode or burst, as in blowing up a balloon.
To spend money recklessly or wastefully, as in blowing all your savings on a vacation.
A sudden, hard stroke with a hand, weapon, or hard object, as in delivering a blow to the head.
